News.headline: LAST CHANCE: Limited Edition Signed Remembrance Day Dagenham & Redbridge Signed Shirt
News.page_title: LAST CHANCE: Limited Edition Signed Remembrance Day Dagenham & Redbridge Signed Shirt
News.URL_keywords: Signed Remembrance Day Dagenham & Redbridge Signed Shirt
News.short_description: Just over 8 hours left to bid on our Limited edition Remembrance day shirt don't miss out on this unique piece of Daggers memorabilia
News.description:
In aid of remembrance weekend the Daggers are auctioning a limited edition remembrance day signed home shirt.

All proceeds from the auction will go directly to the local Royal British Legion Poppy appeal.

This is a great opportunity to raise money for a great cause while also acquiring a great piece of unique Dagenham & Redbridge memorabilia.

The auction will end tonight at 6:40pm before our FA Youth Cup away fixture against Luton Town.

To bid on the limited addition signed shirt click here.
